title: I fucking hate YoloQ.
body: There is nothing fun about that.

replies.body: Fun is not allowed in Rankeds. Because they are rankeds, people _will_ tryhard and try to win. For fun you have normal games.

Bullshit 
Ranked is a lot funner then norms
It's more STRESSFUL is all
In norms everyone try hards with op flavor of the month champs  since they can't be banned.  Same fucking champions every normal game. And the MAR system is fucked so you can be silver playing against plat and diamonds and just get stomped.... 
But that's none of my business
Bullshit, tryhards are fun. People throwing game on porpuse is not.
